name: One Button Hero
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 40
  • Link to the ludum dare entry
What it's about:

You play has a robot which have only one button to trigger all his abilities.
Unfortunately, the more abilitis he has, the worst it gets...

How to play:
  • Move - A and D or arrow keys
  • Trigger abilities - Spacebar
  • Reorder abilities - Mouse
Who has made it:
  • Antoine "Taldius" Semblat - Game designer / Programmer / Artist
  • Aurélien Montero - Composer / Sound designer
